product.title: Hub Stud Kit FJ40, FJ45, FJ55, FJ60, FJ62, BJ 1975-1990
product.body_html: This is a replacement hub stud kit for Toyota FJ40, FJ45, FJ55, FJ60 and FJ62 Land Cruisers. This fits US model front axles for years 9/1975 through 1/1990, as well as non-US model front and rear full float axles. The kit includes all necessary components for hub stud replacement, including the gasket, seal, x6 studs, cone washers and hardware. Cruiser Corps is a worldwide supplier for replacement Toyota Land Cruiser parts. We specialize in new, used and OEM replacement parts for FJ40, FJ45, FJ55, FJ60, FJ62, and FJ80 Land Cruisers. Since 2005 we have been shipping worldwide and have thousands of satisfied customers in over 50 countries. If you have a question or need parts guidance on anything with your Land Cruiser our team would love to help! Call us any time or submit a question to our technicians at this form.
